Chordate/Grimmler/Firearm/Rex/Smokescreen:




Chordate held out his hand for Iron Raptor to shake.  "Glad to meet 
you.  No offense, but what happened to that Liono 'bot who was 
supposed to be command?"

----

Grimmler yelped, bolts hitting his right arm, the arm instantly going 
limp, his gun dropping. (Gangong did use a stun weapon, right? I'm 
pretty sure that's what you said)

----

Smokescreen, in the bridge, set the autoguns to fire upon Gangon.

Then an idea popped into his head.  The flame throwers (reading 
through the Cybertronian Fire's profile, I remembered it had flame 
throwers in the hallway walls!), in the walls, but low, so they would 
only his someone's feet.

He saw that Gangon was a few feet from one, and so was Bright Blade 
(no weak pun intended).

---

Rex and Firearm saw Grimmler get hit with the bolts, and opened fire.

Firearm fired off three plasma blasts from his wrist cannon at 
Gangon's chest.

Rex fired off two laser bolts from his rifle at Gangon's left 
shoulder.
